body_html: @jeichel-miovision thanks for your advice. I upgraded my cuda version and now installing from source is fixed. I have tried installing a version of TF higher than 1.0 in TX1 before but didn't manage to install it successfully. Perhaps it was because I used the older cuda version that came with jetpack 2.3.1.

I have tried installing a version of TF higher than 1.0 in TX1 before but didn't manage to install it successfully. Perhaps it was because I used the older cuda version that came with jetpack 2.3.1.
